title: Pokemon.Y.3DS-PC-CONTRAST
description:
Pokemon Y 3DS Rom.

Pokemon Y is a role-playing video games with adventure elements, presented in a third-person, overhead perspective. It is also the first PokÃƒÂ©mon game to have 3D functions. The player controls a young trainer who goes on a quest to catch and train creatures known as PokÃƒÂ©mon, and win battles against other trainers. By defeating enemy PokÃƒÂ©mon in turn-based battles, the player's PokÃƒÂ©mon gains experience, allowing them to level up and increase their battle statistics, learn new battle techniques, and in some cases, evolve into more powerful PokÃƒÂ©mon. Alternatively, players can capture wild PokÃƒÂ©mon, found during random encounters, by weakening them in battle and catching them with PokÃƒÂ© Balls, allowing them to be added to their party. Players are also able to battle and trade PokÃƒÂ©mon with other human players using the Nintendo 3DS's connectivity features. Like in previous games in the series, certain PokÃƒÂ©mon are only obtainable in either X or Y, with players encouraged to trade with others in order to obtain all PokÃƒÂ©mon from both versions
